name: Diva DivaWash Cleanser
description:
DivaWash is designed to clean and be incredibly gentle on sensitive skin. Botanically-based, it cleans and protects the silicone material of the DivaCup and is gentle enough to be used as a shower gel.Naturally pH balanced formula is fragrance-free and is ideal for sensitive skin.Concentrated formula.Manufactured with no animal testing or animal ingredients.Contains no added parabens, sulfates or petrochemicals.Made of 100% plant-based ingredients. Ingredients: water, [cocamidopropyl betain, decyl polyglucose, sodium cocoyl isethionate] (coconut derived ingredients)], vegetable glycerin, caprylic/capric triglyceride, tocopherol acetate (vitamin E derived from soy), ascorbic acid
(vitamin C), retinyl palmitate (vitamin A), citrus officinalis (grapefruit seed extract, a natural preservative and antimicrobial), xanthan gum, citric acid (pH balancer), citrus sinensis (sweet orange essential oil).For external use only.
